abstract: The move comes after a surprise parting of the ways with Universal, with whom Steven Spielberg signed a deal just four months ago.
snippet: The move comes after a surprise parting of the ways with Universal, with whom Steven Spielberg signed a deal just four months ago.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES  Steven Spielberg seems headed to the Walt Disney Company after a surprise parting of the ways with Universal Pictures, with whom he signed a deal just four months ago.

headline.main: Spielberg’s DreamWorks Said to Be Headed to Disney
headline.print_headline: Spielberg’s DreamWorks Said to Be Headed to Disney

byline.original: By Brooks Barnes and Michael Cieply
